name: Capital Ring link to Streatham Common station

ai.summary: A short, easy urban segment of the Capital Ring near Streatham Common Station in London. This 0.2 km walk offers a quick, low-effort stroll through parkland and light urban paths as part of the larger Capital Ring route.
ai.terrain_summary: Paved paths and parkland sections with some urban street crossings. Generally flat and suitable for all ages; watch for pedestrians and cyclists on shared paths.
ai.safety_notes: Though short, stay aware of traffic at crossings and busy streets nearby. Use crosswalks, keep children within sight, and wear appropriate footwear. In winter, be cautious of wet surfaces and limited lighting; carry a small light if walking after dark.
recommended_gear: Portable phone battery or power bank
ai.best_seasons: All year, with particularly pleasant conditions in spring and autumn in London. Summer can be busy; winter may be cold and damp.
